summary.span: 在某型別的各執行個體間啟用屬性、資源與事件處理常式的共用。

span.span: Enables the sharing of properties, resources, and event handlers between instances of a type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以設定在任何項目，衍生自或。You can set a on any element that derives from or . 樣式通常會宣告為內部資源一節。A style is most commonly declared as a resource inside the section. 由於樣式是資源，因此它們會遵守相同的範圍限定規則適用於所有資源，所以您宣告樣式可以套用它的影響。Because styles are resources, they obey the same scoping rules that apply to all resources, so where you declare a style affects where it can be applied. 如果您宣告在您的應用程式定義的根項目樣式的比方說，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]檔案，可以隨處使用樣式，在您的應用程式。If, for instance, you declare the style in the root element of your application definition [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] file, the style can be used anywhere in your application. 如果您要建立導覽應用程式，並宣告其中一種應用程式的樣式[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]檔案，該樣式可用只在於[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]檔案。If you are creating a navigation application and declare the style in one of the application's [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] files, the style can be used only in that [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] file. 如需有關範圍限定規則的資源的詳細資訊，請參閱[XAML 資源](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md)。For more information on scoping rules for resources, see [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md). 包含樣式宣告物件，其中包含一或多個集合物件。The style declaration consists of a object that contains a collection of one or more objects. 每個組成和。Each consists of a and a . 屬性是套用至項目的樣式屬性名稱。The property is the name of the property of the element the style is to apply to. 樣式被宣告為資源之後，接著就像任何其他資源一樣參考它。After the style is declared as a resource, it can then be referenced just like any other resource. > [!NOTE] > 是否有一個以上的 set 存取子 setter 集合中具有相同上次使用屬性值，宣告的 setter。If there is more than one setter in the setter collection with the same property value, the setter that is declared last is used. 同樣地，如果您設定相同屬性的值中的樣式和項目上直接，項目上直接設定值優先。Similarly, if you set a value for the same property in a style and on an element directly, the value set on the element directly takes precedence. [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]樣式和範本化模型可讓維護及共用外觀，以及展示和邏輯區隔。The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] styling and templating model allows maintenance and sharing of a look as well as the separation of presentation and logic. 樣式和範本化模型包含一組功能，可讓您自訂的您[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]。The styling and templating model includes a suite of features that enable you to customize your [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]. 此套件的功能，包括以及下列類別：This suite of features includes the class as well as the following: - - 和 and - - 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [設定樣式和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md)。For more information, see [Styling and Templating](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範一種樣式的宣告，將會影響屬性。The following example shows a style declaration that will affect the property of a . [!code-xaml[StyleOvw01#StyleSimple](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StyleOvw01/CS/Page1.xaml#stylesimple)] 若要套用上述的樣式，請執行下列作業：To apply the above style, do the following: [!code-xaml[StyleOvw01#StyleSimpleApplied](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StyleOvw01/CS/Page1.xaml#stylesimpleapplied)] 您也可以套用至指定型別的所有項目樣式，使用屬性。You can also apply styles to all elements of a given type by using the property. 將樣式的目標型別，表示您不再需要完整限定您要設定與屬性`ClassName.PropertyName`語法。Adding the target type to the style means that you no longer have to fully qualify the property you are setting with the `ClassName.PropertyName` syntax. 下列範例會定義將套用至每個樣式項目。The following example defines a style that will be applied to every element. [!code-xaml[PhotoStoreDemoStyled#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PhotoStoreDemoStyled/CS/window1.xaml#1)] > [!NOTE] > 許多[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]控制項包含的其他組合[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]控制項，以便建立樣式套用至所有類型的控制項可能會有廣泛的影響。Many [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] controls consist of a combination of other [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] controls, so creating a style that applies to all controls of a type can have broad impact. 比方說，如果您建立目標的樣式中的控制項，樣式會套用到所有畫布中的控制項即使屬於另一個控制項，例如。For instance, if you create a style that targets the controls in a , the style is applied to all controls in the canvas, even if the is part of another control, such as a . 如需如何擴充或繼承自定義的樣式資訊，請參閱頁面。For information on how to extend or inherit from a defined style, see the page.

summary.span: 取得或設定做為目前樣式之基礎的已定義樣式。

span.span: Gets or sets a defined style that is the basis of the current style.

span.span: A defined style that is the basis of the current style.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每種樣式僅支援一張值。Each style only supports one value. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *myStyle**myStyle* 現有的樣式。An existing style. 一般而言，您可以使用[標記延伸和 WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/markup-extensions-and-wpf-xaml.md)來參考現有的樣式。Typically, you use the [Markup Extensions and WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/markup-extensions-and-wpf-xaml.md) to refer to an existing style. ## Examples [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 中的樣式有幾種方法可以擴展或繼承。There are several ways that styles in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] can be extended or inherited. 樣式可以根據透過這個屬性的其他樣式。Styles can be based on other styles through this property. 當您使用這個屬性時，新的樣式會繼承原始樣式不明確重新定義新的樣式中的值。When you use this property, the new style will inherit the values of the original style that are not explicitly redefined in the new style. 在下列範例中，`Style2`繼承的值`Yellow`，並新增的值`Blue`。In the following example, `Style2` inherits the value of `Yellow`, and adds a value of `Blue`. [!code-xaml[StyleOvw01#ExtendingStyle](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StyleOvw01/CS/Page1.xaml#extendingstyle)] 樣式同樣地，根據現有的樣式[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]項目，如下列的範例，其中新的樣式為基礎的樣式項目。Similarly, styles can be based on the style of an existing [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element, as in the following example where the new style is based on the style of a element. [!code-xaml[PhotoStoreDemoStyled#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PhotoStoreDemoStyled/CS/window1.xaml#2)] > [!NOTE] > 如果您建立與樣式屬性和它在另一個樣式的基底也會定義屬性衍生的樣式的目標類型必須相同，或衍生自基底樣式的類型。If you create a style with a property and base it on another style that also defines a property, the target type of the derived style must be the same as or be derived from the type of the base style. 為特定的型別定義的樣式也可以根據其他樣式，如下列範例所示。Styles defined for specific types can also be based on other styles, as in the following example. [!code-xaml[StyleOvw01#ExtendingStyleTargetType](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StyleOvw01/CS/Page1.xaml#extendingstyletargettype)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以設定任何項目，衍生自樣式或。You can set a style on any element that derives from or . 因此，您的目標類型可以是任何這些項目。Therefore, your target type can be any of those elements. 不過，如果您建立與樣式屬性和它在另一個樣式的基底也會定義屬性衍生的樣式的目標類型必須相同，或衍生自的基底樣式的目標類型。However, if you create a style with a property and base it on another style that also defines a property, the target type of the derived style must be the same as or be derived from the target type of the base style. 如果您未指定，則您必須指定`x:Key`針對您和亦可享有以您的類別名稱的樣式屬性。If you do not specify a , then you must specify an `x:Key` for your and also qualify the properties in your style with a class name. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]樣式和範本化模型可讓您指定觸發程序內您。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] styling and templating model enables you to specify triggers within your . 基本上，觸發程序是物件，可讓您套用變更，當特定條件 (例如在某個屬性值時`true`，或在事件發生時) 感到滿意。Essentially, triggers are objects that enable you to apply changes when certain conditions (such as when a certain property value becomes `true`, or when an event occurs) are satisfied. ## XAML 屬性項目用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *oneOrMoreTriggers**oneOrMoreTriggers* 零或多個本身是衍生自類別的物件項目。Zero or more object elements that are classes deriving from . ## Examples 下列範例顯示具名能夠控制項。The following example shows a named available to controls. 定義變更的項目 按鈕的屬性時屬性是`true`。The defines a element that changes the property of a button when the property is `true`. [!code-xaml[BtnStyles#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BtnStyles/CS/app.xaml#2)]
